property.name: text
property.value: The input port has a defaultValue of 0.

property.name: text
property.value:
This model demonstrates the Accessor code generator.
The Accessor code generator only works with models that contain JSAccessor actors.
The code generator creates TestComposite.js in $PTII/org/terraswarm/accessor/accessors/web/host/node
The node Accessor host is then run, which requires that Node.js be installed.

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: description
property.value: Test accessor that multiplies its input by a scale factor.

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: description
property.value: Test accessor that adds its input values.

property.name: inputLeft (port)
property.value: The left input, a number with default 0.

property.name: inputRight (port)
property.value: The right input, a number with default 0.

property.name: sum (port)
property.value: The sum of the two inputs.
